name: the coin
description: $THE One Coin to Rule Them All. Forged in the fires of Pump.fun, blessed by the degen council, and powered by a real community. Now you've stumbled across $THE coin — the community-faith coin with a name you can't forget and memes that write themselves. We lean into the prophecy foreshadowed by pump.fun themselves: "buy the coin." We post, we meme, we onboard frens. We're not the loudest, we're the funniest — and that wins.
